name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken
name_original: Taiko no Tatsujin: Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 26-06-2014. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
You can play Taiko no Tatsujin: Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken on Nintendo 3DS.
